articles.author: Technology Networks
articles.title: Common Lantibiotic Has Unexpected Effect on the Gut Microbiome - Technology Networks
articles.description: A common lantibiotic used in food production has potent effects on both pathogenic and commensal gut bacteria, which may affect out gut health.
articles.content: Food manufacturers often add preservatives to food products to keep them fresh. A primary purpose of these preservatives is to kill microbes that could break down and otherwise spoil the food. Common… [+4462 chars]
